backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, blob storage, and CRUD operations for equipment, assignments, issues, sessions, and activity logs.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature requirement to update frontend App.tsx behavior based on auth state, including affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files covering authentication routing, React Query hooks, screens, components, service worker, and manifest behavior.
frontend/docs/ANDROID_APK_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to generate an Android APK from the PWA using PWABuilder or other methods.
frontend/docs/APK_BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Detailed instructions for packaging the Ramp Track PWA as an Android APK using TWA via PWABuilder or Bubblewrap.
frontend/docs/APK_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Guide describing how to deploy and distribute the generated Android APK for the Ramp Track PWA.
frontend/docs/APK_DOWNLOAD_LINK.md: Instructions for hosting and distributing the generated APK, including GitHub Releases usage.
frontend/docs/APK_QUICK_START.md: Quick-start steps for generating an Android APK from the PWA using PWABuilder.
frontend/docs/INCIDENT_REPORT.md: Incident report detailing credit overuse, deployment issues, scanner problems, and requested support actions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up PWA metadata, splash assets, QR library, and service worker registration with auto-update logic.
frontend/index.ts: Code snippet performing ZXing image decoding from canvas image data using readerRef.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Defines PWA metadata, icons, screenshots, shortcuts, and share-target settings for the Ramp Track app.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements a versioned service worker handling static caching, cache cleanup, and selective network-first or bypassed fetch behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing authentication state, view routing, and reconnecting overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/EquipmentQRScann: Provides a QR scanner using camera streams with a stable video element, overlay UI, and scan handling for login or equipment modes.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Error boundary capturing runtime errors and offering reload, cache clearing, and optional diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login UI supporting username/password or badge scan authentication with error handling and scanner integration.
frontend/src/components/NotFound.tsx: Renders a full-screen 404 page with a home button and background image.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/PWAUpdateNotific: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/ReconnectingOver: Shows a dismissible overlay with a spinner during session reconnecting, using fade animations.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionScr: Displays a role selection UI with back navigation and user info from AuthContext.
frontend/src/components/SignOnScreen.tsx: Provides login role choice buttons for signed-in users and redirects back if no user is present.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows a splash screen with a branded background and loading spinner.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Implements authentication context with session hydration, login, logout, and refresh logic.
frontend/src/data/gates.ts: Exports static gate coordinate data with IDs, lat/lon, and radius values.
frontend/src/data/userRoster.ts: Contains the full user roster with badge IDs, roles, and credentials for authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling AuthClient setup, identity persistence, and login state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for equipment, assignments, and issues using the actor, including validation and mutation side effects.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, color variables, and touch‑optimized UI settings.
frontend/src/lib/apiClient.ts: Centralized authenticated fetch utility with token handling, error classification, and refresh state tracking.
frontend/src/lib/auditLog.ts: Manages local audit logs for scan events, including storing, filtering, and retrieving user and equipment‑specific entries.
frontend/src/lib/autoGateLocator.ts: Provides GPS-based nearest-gate detection using the Haversine formula and a 120m threshold.
frontend/src/lib/ensureUserContext.ts: Loads user context from localStorage with fallbacks and validates sessions without clearing local auth on backend failures.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentHistory.ts: Implements an in-memory equipment event log with functions to add, query, sort, and clear events.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentRegistry.ts: Maintains a localStorage-backed equipment registry with normalization, auto-initialization, and required equipment enforcement.
frontend/src/lib/parseBadge.ts: Extracts the longest digit sequence from scanner input as a badge ID, returning null if fewer than four digits.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing equipment, assignments, logs, local registry data, and audit search tools with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/pages/CheckInScreen.tsx: Check-in workflow handling scans, validation, GPS-based location tagging, session checks, and equipment status updates.
frontend/src/pages/CheckOutScreen.tsx: Implements equipment checkout using QR scanning, validation, GPS capture, and backend update flows.
frontend/src/pages/DEBUG_SAFE.tsx: Simple debug screen confirming root app load.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentDetailScreen: Displays equipment details and history with fallback UI if the ID is invalid.
frontend/src/pages/ManageEquipmentScreen: Provides UI to add, edit, and search equipment records with validation and session checks.
frontend/src/pages/OperatorHomeScreen.ts: Home menu for operators to start actions like checkout, return, or reporting issues.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupScreen.ts: Empty placeholder for profile setup screen.
frontend/src/pages/RampControl.tsx: Empty placeholder for ramp control screen.
frontend/src/pages/ReportIssueScreen.tsx: Handles scanning equipment, entering issue details, capturing photos, and submitting issue reports.
frontend/src/pages/SignInScreen.tsx: React login screen handling operator/admin modes, calling AuthContext.login and managing form state and UI.
frontend/src/types/zxing.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for ZXingBrowser barcode/QR reader interfaces loaded from CDN.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL/session parameter utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing query values across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended color system, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, architecture, and known issues for Ramp Track.
unknown.bash: Build script running pnpm build inside the frontend directory.
unknown.txt: Instructions for distributing and installing an Android APK plus feature list and troubleshooting.
